sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-artwork', templateUrl: './artwork.component.html', styleUrls: ['./artwork.component.scss'] }) export class ArtworkComponent { slides: any[]; constructor() { this.slides = [{ id: 0, src: '../../assets/flight.png', title: 'Flight', subtitle: 'Soaring Through the Sky' }, { id: 1, src: '../../assets/float.png', title: 'Floating Through Time and Space', subtitle: 'Inspired by the way jellyfish magically move around, like creatures from another world.' }, { id: 2, src: '../../assets/hope.png', title: 'The Field of Hope', subtitle: ' (ref:)' }, { id: 3, src: '../../assets/grace.png', title: 'Into Grace', subtitle: 'Loved painting her, (ref: )' }, ]; } }
